'''Metropole Trials''' is a subevent during [[Summertide Scales and Tales]].

It is unlocked after completing the {{Quest|"Owl Musician"}} and can be accessed from the {{Icon|Metropole Trials}} icon.

==Tutorial==
{{Tutorial
|image1 = Tutorial Summertide Scales and Tales Metropole Trials 1.png
|text1  = In "Metropole Trials," you will have to form 2 teams to complete 2-stage combat.<br>For {{Color|help|each different}} character there is in the party, you will gain {{Color|help|1 Valor}}. Valor is jointly contributed by both parties. When your Valor is greater than or equal to {{Color|help|6}}, the combat buffs gained after entering A Time For Valor are greatly enhanced.
|image2 = Tutorial Summertide Scales and Tales Metropole Trials 2.png
|text2  = Defeat opponents to fill the Valor bar. Completely filling the bar starts A Time For Valor, granting significant combat buffs to the team.<br>This state will end after a time, and defeating opponents while in it will grant {{Color|help|extra points}}.
|image3 = Tutorial Summertide Scales and Tales Metropole Trials 3.png
|text3  = Defeating opponents during A Time For Valor will not continue to fill the Valor bar.
}}
